sense.name: building for people
sense.commentary: housing structures collectively; structures in which people are housed
sense.examples: Housing is so expensive in the city.

sense.name: cover
sense.commentary: a protective cover designed to contain or support machines
sense.examples: Underwater housing for digital cameras ought to be clear. I'm looking to purchase a washing machine with rustproof housing.

sense.name: horse armor
sense.commentary: caparison, trappings, housings - a protective cover for a horse; stable gear consisting of a decorated covering for a horse, especially (formerly) for a warhorse
sense.examples: My horse's housing is red to match my hat.
